member.name: T:Drill4Net.Profiling.Tree.CalleeCodeBlock
member.summary: Info for compiler generated methods (caller, indexes, etc)

member.name: P:Drill4Net.Profiling.Tree.CalleeCodeBlock.CallerIndex
member.summary: The instruction index of the caller's IL code where this callee is called (in fact, parent index)

member.name: P:Drill4Net.Profiling.Tree.CalleeCodeBlock.FirstIndex
member.summary: The first index in the compiler generated code which considered as 'business part'

member.name: P:Drill4Net.Profiling.Tree.CrossPoint.BusinessIndex
member.summary: End-to-end index of the instruction, taking into account only the business parts of the source code moved by the compiler to the classes generated by it

member.name: P:Drill4Net.Profiling.Tree.InjectedMethod.BusinessSize
member.summary: Count of instructions in various 'business parts' of the IL code (including compiler generated classes and functions) at the own level of hierarchy of calls CG members

member.name: P:Drill4Net.Profiling.Tree.InjectedMethod.OwnBusinessSize
member.summary: Count of only own 'business parts' of the IL code

member.name: P:Drill4Net.Profiling.Tree.InjectedType.FromMethod
member.summary: For compiler generated classes which was created compiler for some business methods

member.name: F:Drill4Net.Profiling.Tree.MethodType.CompilerGeneratedPart
member.summary: Such methods are generated by the compiler (usually in special classes) and are logically part of the code of other, as a rule, business methods

member.name: F:Drill4Net.Profiling.Tree.MethodType.Normal
member.summary: Normal ('business') method from the user source code
